A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I agree with much of the criticism about the handling of Luke now.... and think Poe was just wasted - he was a complete moron 90% of the time. Overall\, I don’t hate the movie - it had nice set pieces - but seemed very uneven\, and un-Star-Wars-y. It is currently in my bottom 3 along with Phantom Menace and Return of the Jedi.
